        public fr.ign.rjmcmc.sampler.Sampler<fr.ign.mpp.configuration.GraphConfiguration<Cuboid>,fr.ign.mpp.configuration.BirthDeathModification<Cuboid>> create_sampler(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,

                                                                                                                                                                 fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.api.spatial.geomroot.IGeometry geom)
        Creation of the sampler
        Parameters:
        rng - a random generator
        p - the parameters loaded from the json file
        bpU - the basic property unit on which the simulation will be proceeded
        pred - a predicate that will check the respect of the rules
        geom - a geometry that will contains all the cuboid
        Returns:
        a sampler that will be used during the simulation process

      • create_configuration

        public fr.ign.mpp.configuration.GraphConfiguration<Cuboid> create_configuration(SimpluParameters p,

        Creation of a cuboid configuration
        Parameters:
        p - parameters from the json file
        bpu - the basic property unit on which the optimization will be proceeded
        geom - the geometry that contains the cuboids
        Returns:
        a new configuration that embeds the calculation of the optimization function
